newsitem.title: USA: Workgroup Tech may post Q3, Q4 losses.
newsitem.headline: Workgroup Tech may post Q3, Q4 losses.

text.p: Workgroup Technology Corp said on Tuesday it may post losses in the third and fourth quarters because of forming a new integrations development unit, lagging European results, and delays in closing some orders.
In the fourth quarter ended March 31, 1996, the company reported a profit of $482,700, or $0.07 a share.
Workgroup Technology held its initial public offering in March, the company said.
Workgroup Technology said it is redirecting early-stage sales responsibility to corporate staff so its field staff could work on accounts less than $100,000.
The company said it is reverting to an indirect sales channel in the United Kingdom until the market justifies a direct sales effort.
The charges are expected to cut international selling expenses in the fourth quarter of fiscal 1997, it said.
